ISSUE.TITLE: Support TLS 1.3
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop At now TLS 1.2 support is enabled on [entire application](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web.Framework/Infrastructure/Extensions/ServiceCollectionExtensions.cs#L56). Some third-party services are step by step moving to TLS 1.3. Some difficulties with SMTP clients are also possible. Is it time time to upgrade to TLS 1.3? See also: #1871 https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/89848/email-account-tls-connection-problem

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5282 Let the operating system decide what TLS protocol version to use
